sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>5</base_damage> <critical_rating>4</critical_rating> <defense/> <description>The smallest of blasters are easy to conceal but still pack a powerful punch. What they sacrifice most is range, due to their short barrel and lesser charge. Add one setback die to a character's Perception check when attempting to find a holdout pistol on a person's body. Models Include: Imperial Army Scout Trooper Blaster Pistol, Merr-Sonn Q2 Holdout.</description> <encumbrance>1</encumbrance> <hard_points>1</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Holdout Blaster</name> <number>GEAR0001001</number> <price>200</price> <range>short</range> <rarity>4</rarity> <skill_used display_value="Ranged - Light (Ag)">d290dd5cdbae88542901de90cf9619a6</skill_used> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 00:13:49</sys_created_on> <sys_id>cb8a9b502fd06450e0f497eef699b693</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 00:13:49</sys_updated_on> <type>weapon</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
